title: Full Stack Developer
description: Web developer using ReactJS and HTML5 for the back office platform. Providing maintenance to a legacy platform and website made in Cake PHP, CSS. • For Back-end, the creation of micro-services in Amazon API gateway and lambda services using Python as programming language and MYSQL as database engine.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Working in an interdisciplinary project to build an academic platform based on VIVO (software for managing data about researchers, scien-tists, and faculty members), using web ontologies, semantic web and micro-services technologies (http://vivo.uc.cl). System integrator using platform (Mulesoft) to generate micro-services to connect VIVO to different data sources (databases, DSpace reposi- tory, intern softwares, etc...). This software use JAVA as source lan- guage JSON and XML schemas.

title: Delphi programmer
description: Support and developer in applications made in Delphi, forms, web ser- vices and gateway, using oracle 10g as database. The main business core of Worldline is payments and transaction services, our client was Sonda S.A. for the transport system in Santiago.

title: Development Engineer
description: Developer of the Ebook platform using C# and ONIX format for ebooks as technology and web developer using HTML, Javascript, PHP, MySQL and IBM netcommerce

title: Global publication Developer
description: Development of APIs and scripts made in PERL to take news from financial statements and modification of these using regular expressions. Lead a project of information analysis using XML source main data source to inject it into MySQL databases using PERL.
